about.title: About the Journal
about.description: Our editorial mission is to help medical students and physicians make sound ethical decisions in service to patients and society. Founded in 1999, the AMA Journal of Ethics explores the ethical issues and challenges that students, residents, and other physicians are likely to confront in their training and daily practice.

themes.title: Global Reproductive Health Ethics in the 21st Century
Ethical Considerations in Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery
Religion and Spirituality in Health Care Practice
Ethics, Policy, and the Roles of Physicians in Care of the Dying
